text:
@narendramodi 1. No tweet on China's Intrusion in Ladakh
2. No tweet on Migrant Labors 
3. No tweet on Economy
4. No tweet on Dalit Killings 
5. No tweet on Rising cases of Covid-19
But has time to tweet on SS Rajput.
Are you a PM of India or Just Bollywood?
